sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Upon creation, approval = employee manager & state = new

sys_variable_value.value:
Hello, {month} 

Your request for time off has been APPROVED.

Thank You,

The Machi

Hello, 

Your request for time off has been DECLINED.

Please contact your manager if you have any questions.

Thank You,

The Machine

Hello,

    An employee has submitted a Request For Time Off. It is ready for your approval.

Thank You,

The Machine
If approved is APPROVED then send email

Your request for time off has been DECLINED.

Thank You,
